transcript: it all comes down to character and experience if a Founder has a huge amount of experience specifically with the problem that they're trying to solve so we're talking 5 to 10 years of dealing with whatever the issue is and a lot of times if they made the solution to help themselves that helps because they usually tend to be a little more product focused so a product driven entrepreneur who's lived with the issue for a long period of time is incredibly coachable but balances that with a lot of confidence willingness to take risk and ambition
